animeTitle: Yuri!!! on Ice: Yuri Plisetsky GPF in Barcelona EX - Welcome to The Madness
animeDescription: A special included with the 6th DVD/BD volume of Yuri!!! on ICE. It focuses on an exhibition routine performed by Yuri Plisetsky.
